page.title: Examining the Burnt Book
page.text: This book is torn and burned but you manage to find a paragraph you can read: "(...)we came here seeking the famous Blade of Frozen Tear. Alas we decided to rest in this cursed place(...) the cries of fight woke me just to see that my dear Anna is being gutted by the Thorg and his dwarven friend Glinds. The holy fury enraged in me and I managed to fell both devils that once were my friends (...) but fataly wounded (...) and here I lie and write this words felling the last drops of life pouring o(...)
